channel.title: WoodnFab — Projects, Tools & Knowledge on Wood 'n Fab
channel.description: Recent content in WoodnFab — Projects, Tools & Knowledge on Wood 'n Fab

item.title: Rascal CNC
item.description:
While browsing the web for information about ROOT CNC, I came across an intriguing CNC design:

Rascal CNC

The Rascal CNC is a hobby grade CNC machine designed BY the Community FOR the Community with the simple goal of being able to cut foam board airplanes.

Here are just a few benefits of owning a Rascal.

Most capable machine for the cost (under $500 USD) For the cost you won’t find a better suited machine to cut foam board and lite ply on its 30x30" (76cm) cut bed.

  • Building A Workbee Z1+ CNC Part 4 / Mechanical Assembly Completed
  • Building A Workbee Z1+ CNC Part 5 / Build is Finished
